job_tasks.phrase: You'll be working on providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers where they can manage and control their generative AI powered assistants.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and maintaining a platform, which is a traditional software engineering task, specifically integrating generative AI capabilities for customer use.

job_tasks.phrase: Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates building the software systems that provide functionality and control for LLMs and NLP concepts, aligning with integrating these AI components into a product.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Back-End Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring scalability and reliability of a platform are fundamental software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: while collaborating closely with the team to design and implement cutting-edge solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing solutions is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You will integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of integrating AI capabilities into a software product, a key aspect of AI-Adjacent Software Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine.
job_tasks.justification: This describes building a Content Management System (CMS) and data management features, which are traditional software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automationâ€¦).
job_tasks.justification: Building an inference engine is a software development task, focused on the operationalization of AI models.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need for teamwork and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement clearly positions the role as a 'Backend Developer' within a Generative AI team. The described tasks focus heavily on building and integrating a platform, a CMS, and an inference engine that utilize Generative AI and Large Language Models. There are no explicit responsibilities mentioned that involve the core development, fine-tuning, or advanced prompt engineering of the AI models themselves. Instead, the role is about building the software infrastructure that supports and integrates these AI capabilities, fitting the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the role being a Backend Developer and explicitly states the integration of AI capabilities developed by others. The tasks described are predominantly traditional software engineering activities focused on building a platform that uses AI, making the profile assignment unambiguous.
